subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the Blue Jays talk about Scott Rolen, a seven-time Gold Glove winner and a five-time All-Star, they are mystified how a player who gives maximum effort could have so infuriated Tony La Russa.
snippet: When the Blue Jays talk about Scott Rolen, a seven-time Gold Glove winner and a five-time All-Star, they are mystified how a player who gives maximum effort could have so infuriated Tony La Russa.
